roleset.name: absence of joining into a whole

role.descr: specific aspect of args1/2 being unified (if in addition)

example.name: nonunification-n: no args
example.text: Generally court - reform efforts have attempted to move State court systems from the extreme of fragmented nonunification to a unified system that is characterized by consolidation and simplification of court structure , centralized management , centralized rulemaking , centralized budgeting , and State financing .

roleset.note: NONUNIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'unify.01'. (from nonunification.01-n)
Arg4 exists because of the way the verb's arg1 is able to be split up with nominal usage. It isn't expected as its own constituent with verbal rels. (from nonunification.01-n)
